theorem coloring.valid {v w : V} (h : G.adj v w) : C v ≠ C w :=
  C.map_rel h
#align coloring.valid coloring.valid
to_colorable:
theorem coloring.to_colorable [fintype α] (C : G.coloring α) : G.colorable (fintype.card α) :=
  ⟨G.recolor_of_card_le (by simp) C⟩
#align coloring.to_colorable coloring.to_colorable
of_embedding:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ↪g » -/
theorem colorable.of_embedding {V' : Type _} {G' : simple_graph V'} (f : «expr ↪g » G G') {n : ℕ} (h : G'.colorable n) :
    G.colorable n :=
  ⟨(h.to_coloring (by simp)).comp f⟩
#align colorable.of_embedding colorable.of_embedding
not_adj_of_mem_color_class:
theorem coloring.not_adj_of_mem_color_class {c : α} {v w : V} (hv : v ∈ C.color_class c) (hw : w ∈ C.color_class c) :
    ¬G.adj v w := fun h => C.valid h (eq.trans hv (eq.symm hw))
#align coloring.not_adj_of_mem_color_class coloring.not_adj_of_mem_color_class
mono_left:
theorem colorable.mono_left {G' : simple_graph V} (h : G ≤ G') {n : ℕ} (hc : G'.colorable n) : G.colorable n :=
  ⟨hc.some.comp (hom.map_spanning_subgraphs h)⟩
#align colorable.mono_left colorable.mono_left
mono:
-- this was strangely painful; seems like missing lemmas about embeddings
theorem colorable.mono {n m : ℕ} (h : n ≤ m) (hc : G.colorable n) : G.colorable m :=
  ⟨G.recolor_of_card_le (by simp [h]) hc.some⟩
#align colorable.mono colorable.mono
mem_color_classes:
theorem coloring.mem_color_classes {v : V} : C.color_class (C v) ∈ C.color_classes :=
  ⟨v, rfl⟩
#align coloring.mem_color_classes coloring.mem_color_classes
mem_color_class:
theorem coloring.mem_color_class (v : V) : v ∈ C.color_class (C v) :=
  rfl
#align coloring.mem_color_class coloring.mem_color_class
is_empty_of_colorable_zero:
theorem is_empty_of_colorable_zero (h : G.colorable 0) : is_empty V :=
  by
  constructor
  intro v
  obtain ⟨i, hi⟩ := h.some v
  exact nat.not_lt_zero _ hi
#align is_empty_of_colorable_zero is_empty_of_colorable_zero
is_empty_of_chromatic_number_eq_zero:
theorem is_empty_of_chromatic_number_eq_zero (G : simple_graph V) [Finite V] (h : G.chromatic_number = 0) :
    is_empty V := by
  have h' := G.colorable_chromatic_number_of_fintype
  rw [h] at h'
  exact G.is_empty_of_colorable_zero h'
#align is_empty_of_chromatic_number_eq_zero is_empty_of_chromatic_number_eq_zero
colorable_set_nonempty_of_colorable:
theorem colorable_set_nonempty_of_colorable {n : ℕ} (hc : G.colorable n) : { n : ℕ | G.colorable n }.nonempty :=
  ⟨n, hc⟩
#align colorable_set_nonempty_of_colorable colorable_set_nonempty_of_colorable
colorable_of_is_empty:
-- TODO make this computable
theorem colorable_of_is_empty [is_empty V] (n : ℕ) : G.colorable n :=
  ⟨G.coloring_of_is_empty⟩
#align colorable_of_is_empty colorable_of_is_empty
colorable_of_fintype:
theorem colorable_of_fintype (G : simple_graph V) [fintype V] : G.colorable (fintype.card V) :=
  G.self_coloring.to_colorable
#align colorable_of_fintype colorable_of_fintype
colorable_of_chromatic_number_pos:
theorem colorable_of_chromatic_number_pos (h : 0 < G.chromatic_number) : G.colorable G.chromatic_number :=
  by
  obtain ⟨h, hn⟩ := nat.nonempty_of_pos_Inf h
  exact colorable_chromatic_number hn
#align colorable_of_chromatic_number_pos colorable_of_chromatic_number_pos
colorable_iff_exists_bdd_nat_coloring:
theorem colorable_iff_exists_bdd_nat_coloring (n : ℕ) : G.colorable n ↔ ∃ C : G.coloring ℕ, ∀ v, C v < n :=
  by
  constructor
  · rintro hc
    have C : G.coloring (fin n) := hc.to_coloring (by simp)
    let f := embedding.complete_graph Fin.valEmbedding
    use f.to_hom.comp C
    intro v
    cases' C with color valid
    exact Fin.is_lt (color v)
  · rintro ⟨C, Cf⟩
    refine' ⟨coloring.mk _ _⟩
    · exact fun v => ⟨C v, Cf v⟩
    · rintro v w hvw
      simp only [Fin.mk_eq_mk, ne.def]
      exact C.valid hvw
#align colorable_iff_exists_bdd_nat_coloring colorable_iff_exists_bdd_nat_coloring
colorable_chromatic_number_of_fintype:
theorem colorable_chromatic_number_of_fintype (G : simple_graph V) [Finite V] : G.colorable G.chromatic_number :=
  by
  cases nonempty_fintype V
  exact colorable_chromatic_number G.colorable_of_fintype
#align colorable_chromatic_number_of_fintype colorable_chromatic_number_of_fintype
colorable_chromatic_number:
theorem colorable_chromatic_number {m : ℕ} (hc : G.colorable m) : G.colorable G.chromatic_number :=
  by
  dsimp only [chromatic_number]
  rw [nat.Inf_def]
  apply nat.find_spec
  exact colorable_set_nonempty_of_colorable hc
#align colorable_chromatic_number colorable_chromatic_number
color_classes_is_partition:
theorem coloring.color_classes_is_partition : setoid.is_partition C.color_classes :=
  setoid.is_partition_classes (Setoid.ker C)
#align coloring.color_classes_is_partition coloring.color_classes_is_partition
color_classes_independent:
theorem coloring.color_classes_independent (c : α) : IsAntichain G.adj (C.color_class c) := fun v hv w hw h =>
  C.not_adj_of_mem_color_class hv hw
#align coloring.color_classes_independent coloring.color_classes_independent
color_classes_finite:
theorem coloring.color_classes_finite [Finite α] : C.color_classes.finite :=
  setoid.finite_classes_ker _
#align coloring.color_classes_finite coloring.color_classes_finite
clique_free_of_chromatic_number_lt:
-- TODO eliminate `finite V` constraint once chromatic numbers are refactored.
-- This is just to ensure the chromatic number exists.
theorem clique_free_of_chromatic_number_lt [Finite V] {n : ℕ} (hc : G.chromatic_number < n) : G.clique_free n :=
  G.colorable_chromatic_number_of_fintype.clique_free hc
#align clique_free_of_chromatic_number_lt clique_free_of_chromatic_number_lt
clique_free:
protected theorem colorable.clique_free {n m : ℕ} (hc : G.colorable n) (hm : n < m) : G.clique_free m :=
  by
  by_contra h
  simp only [clique_free, is_n_clique_iff, not_forall, not_not] at h
  obtain ⟨s, h, rfl⟩ := h
  exact nat.lt_le_antisymm hm (h.card_le_of_colorable hc)
#align colorable.clique_free colorable.clique_free
chromatic_number_top_eq_zero_of_infinite:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
theorem chromatic_number_top_eq_zero_of_infinite (V : Type _) [Infinite V] :
    («expr⊤» : simple_graph V).chromatic_number = 0 :=
  by
  let n := («expr⊤» : simple_graph V).chromatic_number
  by_contra hc
  replace hc := pos_iff_ne_zero.mpr hc
  apply nat.not_succ_le_self n
  convert_to («expr⊤» : simple_graph { m | m < n + 1 }).chromatic_number ≤ _
  · simp
  refine' (colorable_of_chromatic_number_pos hc).chromatic_number_mono_of_embedding _
  apply embedding.complete_graph
  exact (Function.Embedding.subtype _).trans (infinite.nat_embedding V)
#align chromatic_number_top_eq_zero_of_infinite chromatic_number_top_eq_zero_of_infinite
chromatic_number_top:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
@[simp]
theorem chromatic_number_top [fintype V] : («expr⊤» : simple_graph V).chromatic_number = fintype.card V :=
  by
  apply chromatic_number_eq_card_of_forall_surj (self_coloring _)
  intro C
  rw [← finite.injective_iff_surjective]
  intro v w
  contrapose
  intro h
  exact C.valid h
#align chromatic_number_top chromatic_number_top
chromatic_number_pos:
theorem chromatic_number_pos [nonempty V] {n : ℕ} (hc : G.colorable n) : 0 < G.chromatic_number :=
  by
  apply le_cinfₛ (colorable_set_nonempty_of_colorable hc)
  intro m hm
  by_contra h'
  simp only [not_le, Nat.lt_one_iff] at h'
  subst h'
  obtain ⟨i, hi⟩ := hm.some (classical.arbitrary V)
  exact nat.not_lt_zero _ hi
#align chromatic_number_pos chromatic_number_pos
chromatic_number_mono_of_embedding:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ↪g » -/
theorem colorable.chromatic_number_mono_of_embedding {V' : Type _} {G' : simple_graph V'} {n : ℕ} (h : G'.colorable n)
    (f : «expr ↪g » G G') : G.chromatic_number ≤ G'.chromatic_number :=
  h.chromatic_number_le_of_forall_imp fun _ => colorable.of_embedding f
#align colorable.chromatic_number_mono_of_embedding colorable.chromatic_number_mono_of_embedding
chromatic_number_mono:
theorem colorable.chromatic_number_mono (G' : simple_graph V) {m : ℕ} (hc : G'.colorable m) (h : G ≤ G') :
    G.chromatic_number ≤ G'.chromatic_number :=
  hc.chromatic_number_le_of_forall_imp fun n => colorable.mono_left h
#align colorable.chromatic_number_mono colorable.chromatic_number_mono
chromatic_number_le_one_of_subsingleton:
theorem chromatic_number_le_one_of_subsingleton (G : simple_graph V) [subsingleton V] : G.chromatic_number ≤ 1 :=
  by
  rw [chromatic_number]
  apply cinfₛ_le chromatic_number_bdd_below
  fconstructor
  refine' coloring.mk (fun _ => 0) _
  intro v w
  rw [subsingleton.elim v w]
  simp
#align chromatic_number_le_one_of_subsingleton chromatic_number_le_one_of_subsingleton
chromatic_number_le_of_forall_imp:
theorem colorable.chromatic_number_le_of_forall_imp {V' : Type _} {G' : simple_graph V'} {m : ℕ} (hc : G'.colorable m)
    (h : ∀ n, G'.colorable n → G.colorable n) : G.chromatic_number ≤ G'.chromatic_number :=
  by
  apply cinfₛ_le chromatic_number_bdd_below
  apply h
  apply colorable_chromatic_number hc
#align colorable.chromatic_number_le_of_forall_imp colorable.chromatic_number_le_of_forall_imp
chromatic_number_le_of_colorable:
theorem chromatic_number_le_of_colorable {n : ℕ} (hc : G.colorable n) : G.chromatic_number ≤ n :=
  by
  rw [chromatic_number]
  apply cinfₛ_le chromatic_number_bdd_below
  fconstructor
  exact classical.choice hc
#align chromatic_number_le_of_colorable chromatic_number_le_of_colorable
chromatic_number_le_card:
theorem chromatic_number_le_card [fintype α] (C : G.coloring α) : G.chromatic_number ≤ fintype.card α :=
  cinfₛ_le chromatic_number_bdd_below C.to_colorable
#align chromatic_number_le_card chromatic_number_le_card
chromatic_number_eq_zero_of_isempty:
theorem chromatic_number_eq_zero_of_isempty (G : simple_graph V) [is_empty V] : G.chromatic_number = 0 :=
  by
  rw [← nonpos_iff_eq_zero]
  apply cinfₛ_le chromatic_number_bdd_below
  apply colorable_of_is_empty
#align chromatic_number_eq_zero_of_isempty chromatic_number_eq_zero_of_isempty
chromatic_number_eq_card_of_forall_surj:
theorem chromatic_number_eq_card_of_forall_surj [fintype α] (C : G.coloring α)
    (h : ∀ C' : G.coloring α, function.surjective C') : G.chromatic_number = fintype.card α :=
  by
  apply le_antisymm
  · apply chromatic_number_le_card C
  · by_contra hc
    rw [not_le] at hc
    obtain ⟨n, cn, hc⟩ := exists_lt_of_cinfₛ_lt (colorable_set_nonempty_of_colorable C.to_colorable) hc
    rw [← fintype.card_fin n] at hc
    have f := (function.embedding.nonempty_of_card_le (le_of_lt hc)).some
    have C' := cn.some
    specialize h (G.recolor_of_embedding f C')
    change function.surjective (f ∘ C') at h
    have h1 : function.surjective f := function.surjective.of_comp h
    have h2 := fintype.card_le_of_surjective _ h1
    exact nat.lt_le_antisymm hc h2
#align chromatic_number_eq_card_of_forall_surj chromatic_number_eq_card_of_forall_surj
chromatic_number_bot:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
theorem chromatic_number_bot [nonempty V] : («expr⊥» : simple_graph V).chromatic_number = 1 :=
  by
  let C : («expr⊥» : simple_graph V).coloring (fin 1) := coloring.mk (fun _ => 0) fun v w h => false.elim h
  apply le_antisymm
  · exact chromatic_number_le_card C
  · exact chromatic_number_pos C.to_colorable
#align chromatic_number_bot chromatic_number_bot
chromatic_number_bdd_below:
theorem chromatic_number_bdd_below : BddBelow { n : ℕ | G.colorable n } :=
  ⟨0, fun _ _ => zero_le _⟩
#align chromatic_number_bdd_below chromatic_number_bdd_below
chromatic_number:
theorem complete_bipartite_graph.chromatic_number {V W : Type _} [nonempty V] [nonempty W] :
    (complete_bipartite_graph V W).chromatic_number = 2 :=
  by
  apply chromatic_number_eq_card_of_forall_surj (complete_bipartite_graph.bicoloring V W)
  intro C b
  have v := classical.arbitrary V
  have w := classical.arbitrary W
  have h : (complete_bipartite_graph V W).adj (sum.inl v) (sum.inr w) := by simp
  have hn := C.valid h
  by_cases he : C (sum.inl v) = b
  · exact ⟨_, he⟩
  · by_cases he' : C (sum.inr w) = b
    · exact ⟨_, he'⟩
    · exfalso
      cases b <;> simp only [eq_tt_eq_not_eq_ff, Bool.eq_false_eq_not_eq_true] at he he' <;> rw [he, he'] at hn <;>
        contradiction
#align complete_bipartite_graph.chromatic_number complete_bipartite_graph.chromatic_number
card_le_of_coloring:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ↪g » -/
theorem is_clique.card_le_of_coloring {s : Finset V} (h : G.is_clique s) [fintype α] (C : G.coloring α) :
    s.card ≤ fintype.card α := by
  rw [is_clique_iff_induce_eq] at h
  have f : «expr ↪g » (G.induce ↑s) G := embedding.induce ↑s
  rw [h] at f
  convert fintype.card_le_of_injective _ (C.comp f.to_hom).injective_of_top_hom using 1
  simp
#align is_clique.card_le_of_coloring is_clique.card_le_of_coloring
card_le_of_colorable:
theorem is_clique.card_le_of_colorable {s : Finset V} (h : G.is_clique s) {n : ℕ} (hc : G.colorable n) : s.card ≤ n :=
  by
  convert h.card_le_of_coloring hc.some
  simp
#align is_clique.card_le_of_colorable is_clique.card_le_of_colorable
card_le_chromatic_number:
-- TODO eliminate `finite V` constraint once chromatic numbers are refactored.
-- This is just to ensure the chromatic number exists.
theorem is_clique.card_le_chromatic_number [Finite V] {s : Finset V} (h : G.is_clique s) :
    s.card ≤ G.chromatic_number := by
  cases nonempty_fintype V
  exact h.card_le_of_colorable G.colorable_chromatic_number_of_fintype
#align is_clique.card_le_chromatic_number is_clique.card_le_chromatic_number
card_color_classes_le:
theorem coloring.card_color_classes_le [fintype α] [fintype C.color_classes] :
    fintype.card C.color_classes ≤ fintype.card α :=
  setoid.card_classes_ker_le C
#align coloring.card_color_classes_le coloring.card_color_classes_le
